DOC.brief_title: Safety Low Dose IV Contrast CT Scanning Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The use radio contrast medium enhance image quality CT scan . However , contrast CT avoid patient CKD fear contrast-induced nephropathy . The current standard care patient CT without contrast . Taking advantage fast scan capability modern CT scanner ( 64-Multi-Detector CT ) , current investigator develop method use low volume iso-osmolar non-ionic radio contrast medium ( 30 cc ) use select group adult patient mild moderate stable CKD ( eGFR 16-60 ml/min/m^2 least 12 month ) , require thoracic CT image diagnostic purpose . Up 100 patient meet inclusion/exclusion criterion randomize standard care ( no-contrast , 50 control ) low volume contrast CT ( 50 intervention group ) . The peak increase serum creatinine level within 72 hour CT procedure measure outcome variable comparison two group , well safety monitor variable intervention group ( 25 % increase upper threshold ) .
